hasDitaContent.@value: Both bendamustine and vismodegib can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  bendamustine  and  vismodegib  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with bendamustine. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   bendamustine .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both bendamustine and zidovudine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  bendamustine  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.
